description: Live it up in the 'Vegas of China' at the five-star Crowne Plaza Macau, an IHG Hotel, perfectly set near the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macau HZMB Bridge where vivid city lights and tranquil ocean views come together. title: Lavish Macau Waterfront Escape with Onsite Dining, Two Pools & Spa
description:
Uncover the urban charm of Macau with a stay at this prestigious Sofitel retreat, a beacon of French elegance in the heart of the city. Located in the historic Inner Harbour, you'll find yourself steps away from the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Historic Centre of Macau, a vibrant tapestry of Portuguese and Chinese cultures.

After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's tranquil spa or take a dip in one of two pools. When hunger strikes, delight in French and Chinese fusion at Le Chinois, or delectable international flavours at Mistral. End each day with a night cap at the elgenat Rendez Vous Lobby Bar, complete with golden chandeliers and plush interiors.
offer_address: Rua do Visconde Paco de Arcos, Macau 999078, China

title: Five-Star Macau Waterfront Stay with Swimming Pool Overlooking South China Sea
description: Pure style and sophistication are the focus of the five-star Mandarin Oriental Macau, which boasts an unbeatable location on the prestigious Macau waterfront. Incredible facilities ensure a memorable stay, including four world-class restaurants and bars, an artisan cake shop, a swimming pool overlooking the South China Sea, and a harbourfront fitness centre. For a dose of relaxation, the onsite spa offers a range of treatments designed to pamper you from top to toe.
offer_address: No. 945, Avenida Dr. Sun Yat Sen, Macau, China
